None.Name: Underworld Gate
None.Description: Activate to partially draw the targeted hostile unit into the inbetween. The target will be paralyzed and cannot be attacked by other units. The affected player may no longer play out any more cards of same card as long as either the target unit lives or Banestone are still standing. Reusable every 60 seconds.

None.Name: Blessed Glacial
None.Description: The building is surrounded by an icy aura. The duration of every friendly Ice Shields within a 25m radius is extended by the continuance of this spell
